basics.name: Senthilnathan Karuppaiah
basics.summary: I am a hands-on technical solution architect with a wealth of expertise in product engineering, innovation, business analysis, and solution design. My experience spans a wide spectrum of technologies, including Data Engineering, Web Development, Mobility Solutions, and IoT. I am passionate about crafting innovative solutions that drive success in these domains.

professionalSynopsis: I am a hands-on technical solution architect skilled in conceptualizing and developing innovative software solutions across a wide range of technologies, tools, and frameworks. I have a knack for quickly adapting to new technologies.

My extensive experience spans product engineering, innovation, business analysis, solution design, and architecture in areas such as Data Engineering, Web, Mobility, and IoT. I'm well-versed in both legacy and modern technologies, tools, and frameworks, and I'm passionate about training and academia.

I thrive in startup culture, where I've played a key role in developing cutting-edge software products from initial concept to full product lifecycle. My expertise includes pre-sales, customer acquisition, client site implementation, customization, and ongoing solutions and support.

I have a strong domain background in Data Governance, Data Discovery, Data Lineage, Enterprise Metadata Management, as well as experience in industries like Healthcare IT, Transportation & Logistics, and Agriculture.
I am technically proficient in Golang, Python, NodeJS, C#, JAVA/J2EE, and various Front-End frameworks.

My hands-on experience extends to IaaS & PaaS with the AWS stack (including Elastic Beanstalk, SES, S3, Lambda, EventBridge, Step, and Route53) and containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes. I'm well-versed in Continuous Integration and Delivery, ranging from legacy systems to modern GitOps practices.
I follow a delivery-focused approach, combining architectural, development, and deployment strategies tailored to specific project needs, all guided by agile practices and process implementation.
I've been actively involved in Program Management for multiple key accounts across various technologies and platforms, successfully managing large global teams of over 50 members worldwide.

My commitment extends to maintaining open source projects on GitHub (https://github.com/senthilsweb), and I possess excellent communication, interpersonal, research/analysis, organizational, and leadership skills. I'm a quick learner, adaptable, and process-oriented, with a strong customer-centric approach.
notableAccomplishments: One of the founding developers at Io-Tahoe (formerly Rokittech), a thriving data discovery & governance company based in New York City, known for pioneering the use of AI & ML techniques. Acquired twice, most recently by Hitachi Vantara in May 2021.
Expertise in Product Engineering, specializing in Data Quality, Data Governance, Data Catalog, Data Lineage, Sensitive Data Discovery, and Metadata Management for large enterprises.
Recognized for in-depth knowledge of product development.
Prepared numerous winning proposals, encompassing solutioning, effort estimation, cost analysis, resource allocation, and execution strategies.
Led multiple technology teams in areas such as Client-Server, Web, Mobile, IoT, Cloud, AI/ML, and Data Engineering.
Executed a wide range of development, maintenance, and support projects, catering to clients across the Americas, Europe, Middle East, and Asia Pacific regions.
Architected Radiology Information Systems and associated modules across web, mobile, and cloud platforms.
Established a 24x7 offshore BPO center in Bangalore, India, managing a team of 15 for tasks including scheduling, report faxing, and revenue cycle management.
Boasts a global work experience with roles in the USA, Japan, Ukraine, and Singapore, including three years spent in Japan with conversational Japanese skills.

A blogger since 2007 at www.senthilsweb.com, powered by Docker, EC2, Route53, and Traefik proxy. Actively maintains and contributes to open-source projects on GitHub at https://github.com/senthilsweb. The original blogging platform was on WordPress at https://senthilsweb.wordpress.com/.

work.position: Senior Engineering Manager & Enterprise Data Solutions Architect
work.summary: Joined Lumada Data Catalog Product Development heading the Software Engineers in Test group.

work.position: Solutions Architect / Client Delivery & Head of Production Engineering
work.summary: Managed projects in Data Governance, Data Catalog, Data Lineage, Metadata management for compliance requirements.
Responsible for platform engineering, product ideation, and development using JAVA/J2EE and Python technologies.
Upgraded IT systems, developed custom RIS, HL7 integration engine, and web/mobile apps for radiology centers.
Developed an HTML5-based digital signage platform deployed on AWS S3 for 3000+ restaurants & bars.
Architected and developed enterprise applications, including Dole Fresh Vegetables, SimplicITy, and more.
Worked on multiple web and client-server projects using Oracle, MS SQL Server, and MS Access.
Led solution engineering and technology consultation, project management, and performance optimization.
Worked on Workforce Management Product and SMART CRAWLER for Information Security.
Developed and maintained custom call center applications using Intel dialogic card, VB, and ASP.
Worked on various projects including online shopping, CMS, and more.
Developed Online Telephone Directory Enquiry for Bangalore Telecom.
